text: Yes, it might be a little difficult at times with moving out, but if you'll still be in the UK it will be easy to just grab a coach or train and visit the family and friends in the weekends! While for me it was a bit less frequent as I was only going maybe twice a year back to Greece! But still, it was alright :slightly_smiling_face:
That's great! Hehe think about uni the same way too...It will not be as hard as you imagine it to.. same with the personal statement :wink:
Usually fear makes things look much bigger than they are in reality..and then we realise we have many skills and qualities we didn't know before to handle things :smile:

maybe something that could help with that section of the personal statement is what comes in your mind when trying to think what excites you and when are you the happiest? it can be anything however unimportant it mind sound in your mind because it might show useful information underneath the obvious..
